title: bhASe hInara
sahitya:
bhASE hInara sangavabhimAnabhanga bEsattu bEliya mEloragidante


caraNam 1    hasivigArade bekku hattiyanu meddante trSivikArade kUpa tODidante 
bisilikArade kOti baNDe mEl kuLitante kusumiya holadoLge kaLLa pokkante
    caraNam 2    maLeya rabhasakkanji maravEri kuLitante caLiya tALade jaladi muLugitante 
huLuvina bhayakanji huttadoLu pokkante eLe nariyu oNteya tuTige jOtante
    caraNam 3    sarasa nAriya vESa puruSa nAriya gamana bisilu kudureya bhAva endenisade 
vasudEsha purandara viTTalane kAiva namma eseva nAmava bhajisi sukhiyAgo manave
